channel.title: Help me with server please :)
channel.description:
umm well im using hamachi at the moment, and i cant be asked with it, as no1 uses it, could some1 please tell me how to use things such as no-ip? or servegame, thank you,
Lad~[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2008, 02:18:34 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Help me with server please :)
item.dc:creator: @xerosene xerosene
item.description:
@xerosene wrote:

If you want on your own server you need to just use the ip address 127.0.0.1 because that connects you locally. then follow this TUT if you want to do port forwarding and get a no-ip: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html

Now Hamachi can be unstable, slow, and insecure, so I donâ€™t use it much sorry.
